Description:
Detects when verclsid.exe is used to run COM object via GUID

Author: Victor Sergeev, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Verclsid.exe Runs COM Object
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\verclsid.exe' and original_file_name = 'verclsid.exe') and (command like '%/s%' and command like '%/c%'))
